body: I seriously don't understand how this is a NTR, NTR need romance to exist and this anime is plain out trash, full of psycho girls in it and romance barely exist in the anime, trying to force romance stuff in it is seriously cringe and off-putting considering how garbage and waste of time the anime is besides its beautiful animation.

To add on top of nhcasual's comment, I can see this happening in the anime. Much of the girls are in power and are the dominant ones. The entire male student body are weak sauces, esp the MC. Cept maybe for that one glasses guy Kaede, but then again, don't have much respect or hopes for him either when he's playing the supportive role (treasurer lol) for much of a female dominated student council... I just wish this doujin actually had a proper NTR ending where the girls are completely stolen from the MC. The MC deserves nothing because he contributes absolutely nothing, just like in the anime.
Just had to add a part 4 to hammer home the "she is a whore" part... Should have stopped at the first half of part 2, everything after that was just trashy shit.

I can absolutely see Yumeko doing this in the actual anime, I am sure had it not been cause of the MC she would have somehow ended up gambling herself into prostitution cause it's "exciting" as she says
Iba tan bien y ahora la cagan de esta manera
